casebody.data:
UTILITIES COMM.
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL. No. 196A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 20, 2006. Gary R. Govert, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Margaret A. Force, Assistant Attorney General, for Attorney General. James H. Jeffries, IV, Kim R. Cocklin, Senior Vice President, Charlotte, for Piedmont Natural Gas Co. et al. Gina C. Holt, for Public Staff-Utilites Comm. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utilities Customers. Mary Lynne Grigg, Raleigh, Craig Collins, for Public Service Co. of NC.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 13th day of July 2006 by Appellant (Attorney General) and Appellee (Piedmont Natural Gas Co.) for Extension of Time to File Appellant's Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Appellant (Attorney General) shall have up to and including the 19th day of September 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of July 2006."
